name: CNBC
text: More than 32,000 restaurants have closed during the pandemic, and 61% of those closures are permanent, according to @Yelp data. https://t.co/ZHrwQT3Wtz https://t.co/cqV2EChyF6

name: CNBC
text: Over 80% of hourly workers expect to lose some pay due to remote learning or lack of child care. (via @CNBCMakeIt) https://t.co/eNX6HaAVhf
